basic_information.scholarship_name: The Dr. Mariya Burdina MBA Endowed Scholarship

description: Dr. Mariya Burdina, College of Business professor, created this scholarship to reflect her journey as a female international student coming to the United States. A current female MBA student will be awarded this prestigious scholarship in the hopes of offering encouragement in the pursuit of academic excellence. Eligibility Requirements MBA student Must be enrolled full-time Preference given to a female Preference given to an international student

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
